short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Saves your tabs for a later use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
his extension helps you save and manage your Chrome tabs by exporting them as a JSON file. It’s designed to reduce memory usage by allowing users to temporarily close tabs without losing them. You can reopen saved tabs at any time by simply reloading the JSON file. Ideal for users who work on multiple projects or tasks simultaneously and need an easy way to organize and retrieve their browser sessions without cluttering the system with too many open tabs. It provides an efficient solution for managing your workflow and keeping your browser running smoothly.

Features:

1. Save open Chrome tabs as a JSON file with one click.
2. Easily reload saved tabs to continue where you left off.
3. Reduce memory usage by closing tabs you don’t need immediately.
4. Simple and intuitive interface.
